pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates Pseudo-Observations and Analysis for Recurrent Event Data // Computation of one-, two- and three-dimensional pseudo- observations based on recurrent events and terminal events. Generalised linear models are fitted using generalised estimating equations. Technical details on the bivariate procedure can be found in "Bivariate pseudo-observations for recurrent event analysis with terminal events" (Furberg et al., 2021) doi:10.1007/s10985-021-09533-5.
